LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.label: Organic regeneration
LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.description: Specialized mechanites are repairing and fortifying damaged parts of the body.
LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.stages.0.label: Insignificant
LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.stages.1.label: Minor
LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.stages.2.label: Moderate
LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.stages.3.label: Significant
LanguageData.ATR_RegenOrganic.stages.4.label: Peak
LanguageData.ATR_RegenMechanical.label: Mechanical regeneration
LanguageData.ATR_RegenMechanical.description: Specially designed mechanites are repairing and fortifying damaged regions of the chassis.
